alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 4:06AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Central and eastern Laramie County including the cities of Cheyenne and Pine Bluffs. The highest totals are expected over northern portions of Laramie County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Monday. A lull in the snowfall will occur this afternoon with the heaviest snow expected overnight through Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
